root.name: Broken Sword: The Serpent's Curse
root.description: According to it's Kickstarter page, Broken Sword: The Serpent's Curse will have cast of new and old characters, announced so far are George Stobbart, Nico Collard, Pearl and her husband Duane Henderson who will be portrayed in the classic hand-drawn 2D setting.The game itself will have large number of locations that the player will be able to visit in any order they wish, including parts of Europe and the Middle East. The Serpent's Curse will also have smaller stories to compliment the full game, that will be fleshed out and resolved throughout.Though the game doesn't yet have a hard release date, a post on Broken Sword's official facebook page indicates that they are hopeful for a September 2013 release.
